ResearchProjectDef.label: Thornsworth Holography
ResearchProjectDef.description:
The holographam artist Thornsworth, despite growing blindness, continued producing masterpieces for many years, and when holographic data storage was finally perfected, he was instrumental in developing Holographic Item Storage.
Allows Items to be stored wirelessly in a Digital Storage Unit. Can be send to any I/O port on map, and recieve items from I/O ports too.

You will be missed, Thornsworth.
